name: Knight
description: A skilled warrior clad in heavy armor, wielding a sword with precision.

name: Mage
description: A master of arcane arts, capable of casting powerful spells.

name: Rogue
description: A nimble and stealthy character, skilled in the art of deception.

name: Paladin
description: A holy warrior dedicated to upholding justice and righteousness.

name: Bard
description: A charismatic performer who uses music to inspire allies and confuse foes.

name: Druid
description: A guardian of nature who can transform into animals and wield elemental magic.

name: Warlock
description: A spellcaster who has made a pact with a powerful entity for magical abilities.

name: Ranger
description: A skilled tracker and hunter, adept at surviving in the wilderness.

name: Cleric
description: A divine spellcaster who channels the power of their deity to heal and protect.

name: Necromancer
description: A spellcaster with innate magical abilities, drawing power from their bloodline.
